TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ResourceSet extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable
Public Class ResourceSet Implements IDisposable, IEnumerable
public ref class ResourceSet : IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerable

summary.span: 儲存針對某個文化特性並忽略其他所有文化特性進行當地語系化的所有資源，包括任何後援規則。

span.span: Stores all the resources localized for one particular culture, ignoring all other cultures, including any fallback rules.

summary.span: **安全性提示**：使用不受信任的資料呼叫這個類別中的方法會造成安全性風險。

span.span: **Security Note**: Calling methods in this class with untrusted data is a security risk.

summary.span: 只能使用信任的資料呼叫類別中的方法。

span.span: Call the methods in the class only with trusted data.

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Untrusted Data Security Risks](https://docs.com/rick-anderson-1/8710/untrusted-data-security-risks) (不受信任的資料安全性風險)。

span.span: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](https://docs.com/rick-anderson-1/8710/untrusted-data-security-risks).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別列舉、 載入每個名稱和值，並將它們儲存在。The class enumerates over an , loading every name and value, and storing them in a . 自訂可用。A custom can be used. 您可以具現化物件，代表特定文化特性的資源，藉由呼叫方法。You can instantiate a object that represents the resources of a specific culture by calling the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic.

span.span: Releases resources (other than memory) associated with the current instance, closing internal managed objects if requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`dispose`參數是`true`，目前的方法會釋放它搭配以及與其相關聯的所有物件相關聯的所有資源。If the `dispose` parameter is `true`, the current method frees all the resources associated with it as well as with all objects associated with it. 如果`dispose`是`false`，目前的方法會釋出的資源配置給它，並忽略任何與其相關聯的物件。If `dispose` is `false`, the current method frees only the resources allocated to it, and ignores any objects associated with it.

span.span: Returns an that can iterate through the .
An for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 在超過集合的末端後，列舉值會放置在集合最後一個元素之後，並且呼叫 會傳回 `false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果在 和 之間修改集合， 將傳回所設定的元素，即使列舉值已經無效。If the collection is modified between and , will return the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 您可以使用屬性來存取儲存在目前的項目中的值。You can use the property to access the value stored in the current element. 使用屬性來存取目前的項目索引鍵。Use the property to access the key of the current element. 使用屬性來存取目前項目的值。Use the property to access the value of the current element. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立`rs`檔案`items.resources`。The following example demonstrates how to create a `rs` for the file `items.resources`. 下一步方法用來建立如`rs`。Next, the method is used to create an for `rs`. 逐一`rs`，並在主控台顯示內容。The iterates through `rs` and displays the contents to the console. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator/CPP/getenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator/CS/getenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceSet.GetEnumerator/VB/getenumerator.vb#1)]

span.span: Name of the resource to search for.

summary.span: 如果要求的話，以不區分大小寫的指定名稱搜尋資源物件。

span.span: Searches for a resource object with the specified name in a case-insensitive manner, if requested.
The requested resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值`ignoreCase`參數是`true`，有名稱為 「 資源 」 的資源就相當於 「 資源 」 名稱的資源。If the value of the `ignoreCase` parameter is `true`, a resource with the name "Resource" is equivalent to the resource with the name "resource". 不過請注意，這個方法一律會執行不區分大小寫字串比較使用。Note, however, that this method always performs case-insensitive string comparisons using . 優點是，這個方法所執行的不區分大小寫字串比較的結果是不論文化特性的所有電腦上相同。The advantage is that results of case-insensitive string comparisons performed by this method are the same on all computers regardless of culture. 缺點是結果不一致的所有文化特性的大小寫規則。The disadvantage is that the results are not consistent with the casing rules of all cultures. 比方說，土耳其文的字母會有兩個版本的字元 i： 一個點，一個沒有點。For example, the Turkish alphabet has two versions of the character I: one with a dot and one without a dot. 在土耳其文，字元我 (Unicode 0049) 會視為不同的字元 (Unicode 0131) ı 的大寫版本。In Turkish, the character I (Unicode 0049) is considered the uppercase version of a different character ı (Unicode 0131). I (Unicode 0069) 的字元會被視為另一個字元 İ (Unicode 0130) 的小寫版本。The character i (Unicode 0069) is considered the lowercase version of yet another character İ (Unicode 0130). 根據這些大小寫規則，不區分大小寫字串比較的字元 (Unicode 0069) i 和 I (Unicode 0049) 應該文化特性"TR-TR"（在土耳其土耳其文） 失敗。According to these casing rules, a case-insensitive string comparison of the characters i (Unicode 0069) and I (Unicode 0049) should fail for the culture "tr-TR" (Turkish in Turkey). 使用`GetObject`方法`ignoreCase`設`true`，這項比較會成功。Using the `GetObject` method with `ignoreCase` set to `true`, this comparison succeeds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值`ignoreCase`參數是`true`，有名稱為 「 資源 」 的資源就相當於 「 資源 」 名稱的資源。If the value of the `ignoreCase` parameter is `true`, a resource with the name "Resource" is equivalent to the resource with the name "resource". 不過請注意，這個方法一律會執行不區分大小寫字串比較使用。Note, however, that this method always performs case-insensitive string comparisons using . 優點是，這個方法所執行的不區分大小寫字串比較的結果是不論文化特性的所有電腦上相同。The advantage is that results of case-insensitive string comparisons performed by this method are the same on all computers regardless of culture. 缺點是結果不一致的所有文化特性的大小寫規則。The disadvantage is that the results are not consistent with the casing rules of all cultures. 比方說，土耳其文的字母會有兩個版本的字元 i： 一個點，一個沒有點。For example, the Turkish alphabet has two versions of the character I: one with a dot and one without a dot. 在土耳其文，字元我 (Unicode 0049) 會視為不同的字元 (Unicode 0131) ı 的大寫版本。In Turkish, the character I (Unicode 0049) is considered the uppercase version of a different character ı (Unicode 0131). I (Unicode 0069) 的字元會被視為另一個字元 İ (Unicode 0130) 的小寫版本。The character i (Unicode 0069) is considered the lowercase version of yet another character İ (Unicode 0130). 根據這些大小寫規則，不區分大小寫字串比較的字元 (Unicode 0069) i 和 I (Unicode 0049) 應該文化特性"TR-TR"（在土耳其土耳其文） 失敗。According to these casing rules, a case-insensitive string comparison of the characters i (Unicode 0069) and I (Unicode 0049) should fail for the culture "tr-TR" (Turkish in Turkey). 使用`GetString`方法`ignoreCase`設`true`，這項比較會成功。Using the `GetString` method with `ignoreCase` set to `true`, this comparison succeeds.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReadResources() cil managed

summary.span: 讀取所有資源，並將它們儲存在 屬性指定的 中。

span.span: Reads all the resources and stores them in a indicated in the property.

para.span: 在衍生類別的應該明確地呼叫載入從所有資源到，通常在建構函式中或延遲的方式在第一個呼叫或或。

span.span: Derived classes of should explicitly call to load all the resources from the into , generally either in the constructor or lazily on the first call to either or .

para.span: 不過，如果您的資源集和 IResourceReader 已經有其他相關資訊，且有幾個載入更有效率的方式選取的資源，可以略過此步驟。

span.span: However, if your resource set and IResourceReader already have information about each other and have a more efficient way to load just a few select resources, this step can be skipped.

para.span: 若要降低工作集，撰寫您的資源集的方式，它會查詢您 IResourceReader 只有您的應用程式所要求的資源值。

span.span: To minimize working set, write your resource set in such a way that it queries your IResourceReader for only the resource values requested by your application.
